Package com.erliapp.utilities.database

Class CassandraDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.erliapp.utilities.database.CassandraDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database
public class CassandraDatabase extends Object implements Database
Cassandra Database instance. Connects to a Cassandra Database to get information.

      public List<Map<String,Row>> select(String[] selecting, String database, String where)
      Runs a CQL SELECT statement, and returns a list of data.
      Specified by:
      select in interface Database
      Parameters:
      selecting - Columns to select in the database
      database - Title of the table being selected from
      where - Anything after a selection, could be a WHERE statement, or a LIMIT statement
      Returns:
      A List of rows, with each column within.

    • update

      public void update(String query)
      Runs any non-data request to a database. Does not return any data, and does not insert a new row.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Database
      Parameters:
      query - Query to run.
